Name: Furious Drivers
About the game: Pick up weapons on the map and destroy other players with them. In subsequent updates, you can collect materials from defeated enemies, and pump your cars with them. Discover new cars, parts for it and various variations of colors. You will also get access to new maps and modes, and you will be able to participate in rating matches to prove to everyone who is the most furious carrier here.
